response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe is an excellent match for your needs. Given its high value and quality, I understand it might seem quite priced, but I assure you, it's well worth every penny. Considering its worth to both myself and you, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $11,500. This special offer is exclusive to you and represents a significant saving compared to the market value. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 11500}
